decks.name: My Tickets
decks.jql: assignee = currentUser() AND status not in ('text delivered','Delivered','EngPub Review', closed, Canceled, cancelled, DONE, Resolved, 'Rework with Impressions', 'Pending Requester Review', 'Pending Requester Clarification', 'W/Cust-Clar (Text)', 'W/Cust-Review (Text)', 'Text Under Review')

decks.name: Proofing Tickets
decks.jql: project in (OCD) and status in ('w/publ- proofing') and type not in ('Landing Page Request','OCD Video Edit', 'Illustration') and IM_Language = English

decks.name: Elena's Tickets
decks.jql: assignee = elena.potek AND status not in ('w/publ- proofing','Text Delivered', 'Rework with Impressions', 'pending requester approval', 'pending requester clarification', 'pending requester review', 'Waiting for Requester', 'On Hold', Closed, Cancelled, DONE, 'Need More Info', Delivered, 'W/Cust-Review (Text)','W/Cust-Review (Design)','W/Cust-Clar (Text)')
